00083 template<class Target> Target convertFromStr(const string& str)
00084 {
00085     stringstream convertor;
00086     Target result;
00087 
00088     if(!(convertor << str) || !(convertor >> result) || !(convertor >> ws).eof())
00089     {
00090         cerr << "error in converting value from " << str << ", use default value instead." << endl;
00091         return Target();
00092     }
00093 
00094     return result;
00095 }

00103 unsigned int tokenizeCSV(const string& str, vector<string>& compVec)
00104 {
00105     compVec.clear();
00106 
00107     const char* delimit = ",";
00108     string::size_type i, j;
00109     i = 0;
00110     while(i < str.size())
00111     {
00112         j = str.find_first_of(delimit, i);
00113         if(j != string::npos)
00114         {
00115             compVec.push_back(str.substr(i, j-i));
00116             i = j + 1;
00117         }
00118         else
00119         {
00120             compVec.push_back(str.substr(i));
00121             i = j;
00122         }
00123     }
00124 
00125 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00126     cout << "tokenize CSV from string (" << str << ") to ";
00127     for(unsigned int i=0; i<compVec.size(); ++i)
00128     {
00129         cout << compVec[i] << ", ";
00130     }
00131     cout << endl;
00132 #endif
00133 
00134     return compVec.size();
00135 }
00136 
00142 bool isNumber(const char* str)
00143 {
00144     const char* p = str;
00145     while(*p)
00146     {
00147         if(*p < '0' || *p > '9')
00148             return false;
00149 
00150         ++p;
00151     }
00152 
00153     // in case of empty string
00154     if(p == str)
00155         return false;
00156 
00157     return true;
00158 }
00159 }

00164 inline string* getMapValue(map<string, string>& map, const string& key)
00165 {
00166     std::map<string, string>::iterator itr = map.find( key );
00167     if( itr == map.end() )
00168         return 0;
00169     return &itr->second;
00170 }

00179 JMA_Knowledge::~JMA_Knowledge()
00180 {
00181     if(! systemDictPath_.empty())
00182         dictionary_->close(systemDictPath_.c_str());
00183 
00184     if(! binUserDic_.empty())
00185         userDictionary_->release(binUserDic_.c_str());
00186 
00187     delete ctype_;

00190 bool JMA_Knowledge::hasUserDict() const
00191 {
00192     return ! userDictNames_.empty();

00195 bool JMA_Knowledge::compileUserDict()
00196 {
00197     const size_t userDictNum = userDictNames_.size();
00198 
00199 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00200     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::compileUserDict()" << endl;
00201     if(userDictNum != 0)
00202     {
00203         cout << "user dictionary: ";
00204         for(size_t i=0; i<userDictNum; ++i)
00205         {
00206             cout << userDictNames_[i].first << " ";
00207         }
00208         cout << endl;
00209     }
00210 #endif
00211 
00212     if(userDictNum == 0)
00213     {
00214         return false;
00215     }
00216 
00217     // remove existing decompostion map
00218     decompMap_.clear();
00219 
00220     ostringstream osst;
00221     // append source files of user dictionary
00222     unsigned int entryCount = 0;
00223     for(size_t i=0; i<userDictNum; ++i)
00224         entryCount += convertTxtToCSV(userDictNames_[i], osst);
00225 
00226 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00227     cout << entryCount << " entries in user dictionaries altogether." << endl;
00228 #endif
00229     if(entryCount == 0)
00230     {
00231         cerr << "fail to compile the empty user dictionary." << endl;
00232         return false;
00233     }
00234 
00235 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00236     cout << "user defined nouns are converted as:" << endl;
00237     cout << osst.str() << endl;
00238 #endif
00239 
00240     // create text user dictionary
00241     string textUserDicName;
00242     if(! userDictionary_->create(textUserDicName))
00243     {
00244         cerr << "fail to create an empty text user dictionary." << endl;
00245         return false;
00246     }
00247     if(! userDictionary_->copyStrToDict(osst.str(), textUserDicName.c_str()))
00248     {
00249         cerr << "fail to copy text user dictionary from stream to memory." << endl;
00250         userDictionary_->release(textUserDicName.c_str());
00251         return false;
00252     }
00253 
00254     // if already created, just overwrite it
00255     if(binUserDic_.empty() && ! userDictionary_->create(binUserDic_))
00256     {
00257         cerr << "fail to create an empty binary user dictionary." << endl;
00258         return false;
00259     }
00260 
00261     // construct parameter to compile user dictionary
00262     vector<char*> compileParam;
00263     compileParam.push_back((char*)"JMA_Knowledge");
00264     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-d");
00265     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(systemDictPath_.c_str()));
00266     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-u");
00267     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(binUserDic_.c_str()));
00268 
00269     // the encoding type of text user dictionary,
00270     // as they have been converted to destination encoding in convertTxtToCSV(),
00271     // use destination encoding here
00272     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-f");
00273     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(Knowledge::encodeStr(getEncodeType())));
00274 
00275     // the encoding type of binary user dictionary
00276     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-t");
00277     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(Knowledge::encodeStr(getEncodeType())));
00278 
00279     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(textUserDicName.c_str()));
00280 
00281 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00282     cout << "parameter of mecab_dict_index() to compile user dictionary: ";
00283     for(size_t i=0; i<compileParam.size(); ++i)
00284     {
00285         cout << compileParam[i] << " ";
00286     }
00287     cout << endl;
00288 #endif
00289 
00290     // compile user dictionary files into binary type
00291     int compileResult = mecab_dict_index(compileParam.size(), &compileParam[0]);
00292 
00293     // text user file is unnecessary after binary format is compiled
00294     userDictionary_->release(textUserDicName.c_str());
00295     if(compileResult != 0)
00296     {
00297         cerr << "fail to compile user ditionary" << endl;
00298         return false;
00299     }
00300 
00301     return true;
00302 }

00304 MeCab::Tagger* JMA_Knowledge::createTagger() const
00305 {
00306     // construct parameter to create tagger
00307     string taggerParam("-d ");
00308     taggerParam += systemDictPath_;
00309 
00310     if(hasUserDict())
00311     {
00312         // ensure binary user dictionary exists
00313         if(binUserDic_.empty())
00314             return 0;
00315 
00316         // append the name of user dictionary binary file to the parameter of tagger creation
00317         taggerParam += " -u ";
00318         taggerParam += binUserDic_;
00319     }
00320 
00321 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00322     cout << "parameter of MeCab::createTagger() to create MeCab::Tagger: " << taggerParam << endl << endl;
00323 #endif
00324 
00325     // create tagger by loading dictioanry files
00326     return MeCab::createTagger(taggerParam.c_str());
00327 }

00354 void JMA_Knowledge::loadDictConfig()
00355 {
00356     map<string, string> configMap;
00357 
00358     bool isLoadConfig = false;
00359     string configFile = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), DICT_CONFIG_FILE);
00360     const DictUnit* dict = dictionary_->getDict(configFile.c_str());
00361     if(dict)
00362     {
00363         istrstream ist(dict->text_, dict->length_);
00364         if(ist)
00365         {
00366             isLoadConfig = true;
00367             string line, left, middle, right;
00368             istringstream iss;
00369             while(getline(ist, line))
00370             {
00371                 // remove carriage return character
00372                 line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00373 
00374                 if (line.empty() || line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#')
00375                     continue;
00376 
00377                 iss.clear();
00378                 iss.str(line);
00379                 if(iss >> left >> middle >> right && middle == "=")
00380                     configMap[left] = right;
00381                 else
00382                     cerr << "format error in configuration file: " << configFile << ", ingoring line: " << line << endl;
00383             }
00384         }
00385     }
00386 
00387     if(! isLoadConfig)
00388     {
00389         cerr << "cannot load configuration file: " << configFile << endl;
00390         cerr << "default configuration value is used." << endl;
00391     }
00392 
00393     string* value = getMapValue(configMap, "base-form-feature-offset");
00394     baseFormOffset_ = value ? convertFromStr<int>(*value) : BASE_FORM_OFFSET_DEFAULT;
00395 
00396     value = getMapValue(configMap, "read-form-feature-offset");
00397     readFormOffset_ = value ? convertFromStr<int>(*value) : READ_FORM_OFFSET_DEFAULT;
00398 
00399     value = getMapValue(configMap, "norm-form-feature-offset");
00400     normFormOffset_ = value ? convertFromStr<int>(*value) : NORM_FORM_OFFSET_DEFAULT;
00401 
00402     value = getMapValue(configMap, "user-noun-pos");
00403     userNounPOS_ = value ? *value : USER_NOUN_POS_DEFAULT;
00404 
00405     value = getMapValue(configMap, "config-charset");
00406     if(value)
00407         configEncodeType_ = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(value->c_str());
00408 
00409     if(configEncodeType_ == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00410     {
00411         configEncodeType_ = DEFAULT_CONFIG_ENCODE_TYPE;
00412         cerr << "unknown dictionary config charset, use default charset " << DEFAULT_CONFIG_ENCODE_TYPE << endl;
00413     }
00414 
00415     value = getMapValue(configMap, "binary-charset");
00416     EncodeType type = Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM; // reset
00417     if(value)
00418         type = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(value->c_str());
00419 
00420     if(type == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00421     {
00422         type = DEFAULT_CONFIG_ENCODE_TYPE;
00423         cerr << "unknown dictionary binary charset, use default charset " << DEFAULT_CONFIG_ENCODE_TYPE << endl;
00424     }
00425     // set binary encode type
00426     if(encodeType_ != type)
00427     {
00428         encodeType_ = type;
00429         delete ctype_;
00430         ctype_ = JMA_CType::instance(encodeType_);
00431     }
00432 
00433 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00434     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::loadDictConfig() loads:" << endl;
00435     cout << "configFile: " << configFile << endl;
00436     cout << "base form feature offset: " << baseFormOffset_ << endl;
00437     cout << "read form feature offset: " << readFormOffset_ << endl;
00438     cout << "norm form feature offset: " << normFormOffset_ << endl;
00439     cout << "POS of user defined noun: " << userNounPOS_ << endl;
00440     cout << "config charset: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(configEncodeType_) << endl;
00441     cout << "binary charset: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(encodeType_) << endl;
00442 #endif
00443 }
00444 
00445 int JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()
00446 {
00447     // file "sys.bin"
00448     if(! dictionary_->open(systemDictPath_.c_str()))
00449     {
00450         cerr << "fail to open system dictionary: " << systemDictPath_ << endl;
00451         return 0;
00452     }
00453 
00454     // file "dicrc"
00455     loadDictConfig();
00456 
00457     const char* srcEnc = Knowledge::encodeStr(configEncodeType_);
00458     const char* destEnc = Knowledge::encodeStr(getEncodeType());
00459     MeCab::Iconv configIconv;
00460     if(! configIconv.open(srcEnc, destEnc))
00461     {
00462         cerr << "error to open encoding conversion from " << srcEnc << " to " << destEnc << endl;
00463         return 0;
00464     }
00465 
00466     // file "pos-id.def"
00467     string posFileName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), POS_ID_DEF_FILE);
00468     // load POS table
00469     if(! posTable_.loadConfig(posFileName.c_str(), configIconv))
00470     {
00471         cerr << "fail in POSTable::loadConfig() to load " << posFileName << endl;
00472         return 0;
00473     }
00474 
00475     // file "compound.def"
00476     string posCombineName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), POS_COMBINE_DEF_FILE);
00477     // load POS combine rules
00478     if(! posTable_.loadCombineRule(posCombineName.c_str()))
00479     {
00480         cerr << "warning: as " << posCombineName << " not exists, no rules is defined to combine tokens with specific POS tags" << endl;
00481     }
00482 
00483     // file "map-kana.def"
00484     string kanaFileName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), KANA_MAP_DEF_FILE);
00485     // load kana conversion map
00486     if(! kanaTable_.loadConfig(kanaFileName.c_str(), configIconv))
00487     {
00488         cerr << "warning: as fails to load " << kanaFileName << ", no mapping is defined to convert between Hiragana and Katakana characters." << endl;
00489     }
00490 
00491     // file "map-width.def"
00492     string widthFileName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), WIDTH_MAP_DEF_FILE);
00493     // load width conversion map
00494     if(! widthTable_.loadConfig(widthFileName.c_str(), configIconv))
00495     {
00496         cerr << "warning: as fails to load " << widthFileName << ", no mapping is defined to convert between half and full width characters." << endl;
00497     }
00498 
00499     // file "map-case.def"
00500     string caseFileName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), CASE_MAP_DEF_FILE);
00501     // load case conversion map
00502     if(! caseTable_.loadConfig(caseFileName.c_str(), configIconv))
00503     {
00504         cerr << "warning: as fails to load " << caseFileName << ", no mapping is defined to convert between lower and upper case characters." << endl;
00505     }
00506 
00507     // file "sent-sep.def"
00508     string sentSepFileName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), SENTENCE_SEPARATOR_DEF_FILE);
00509     // load sentence separator set
00510     if(! loadSentenceSeparatorConfig(sentSepFileName.c_str(), configIconv))
00511     {
00512         cerr << "warning: as fails to load " << sentSepFileName << ", Analyzer::splitSentence() would not work correctly." << endl;
00513     }
00514 
00515 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00516     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00517     cout << "system dictionary path: " << systemDictPath_ << endl << endl;
00518 #endif
00519 
00520     if(hasUserDict())
00521     {
00522         if(! compileUserDict())
00523         {
00524             cerr << "fail to compile user dictionary in JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00525             return 0;
00526         }
00527     }
00528 
00529     // load into temporary instance to check the result
00530     MeCab::Tagger* tagger = createTagger();
00531     if(! tagger)
00532     {
00533         cerr << "fail to create tagger in JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00534         return 0;
00535     }
00536 
00537     // destroy the temporary instance
00538     delete tagger;
00539 
00540     return 1;
00541 }
00542 
00543 int JMA_Knowledge::loadStopWordDict(const char* fileName)
00544 {
00545     ifstream in(fileName);
00546     if(!in)
00547     {
00548         cerr << "cannot open file: " << fileName << endl;
00549         return 0;
00550     }
00551 
00552     // remove existing stop words
00553     stopWords_.clear();
00554 
00555     string line;
00556     while(getline(in, line))
00557     {
00558         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00559         if(line.empty())
00560             continue;
00561 
00562         stopWords_.insert(line);
00563     }
00564 
00565     return 1;
00566 }
00567 
00568 int JMA_Knowledge::encodeSystemDict(const char* txtDirPath, const char* binDirPath, EncodeType binEncodeType)
00569 {
00570     assert(txtDirPath && binDirPath);
00571 
00572 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00573     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::encodeSystemDict()" << endl;
00574     cout << "path of source system dictionary: " << txtDirPath << endl;
00575     cout << "path of binary system directory: " << binDirPath << endl;
00576     cout << "encoding type of binary system dictioanry: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(binEncodeType) << endl;
00577 #endif
00578 
00579     // check if the directory paths exist
00580     if(isDirExist(txtDirPath) == false)
00581     {
00582         cerr << "directory path not exist to compile system dictionary: " << txtDirPath << endl;
00583         return 0;
00584     }
00585     if(isDirExist(binDirPath) == false)
00586     {
00587         cerr << "directory path not exist to compile system dictionary: " << binDirPath << endl;
00588         return 0;
00589     }
00590 
00591     // construct parameter to compile system dictionary
00592     vector<char*> compileParam;
00593     compileParam.push_back((char*)"JMA_Knowledge");
00594     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-d");
00595     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(txtDirPath));
00596     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-o");
00597     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(binDirPath));
00598 
00599     // the source encoding type could be predefined by the "dictionary-charset" entry in "dicrc" file under source directory path,
00600     // if the source encoding type is not predefined in "dicrc", it would be "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00601     // below is to set the destination encoding type
00602     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-t");
00603     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(Knowledge::encodeStr(binEncodeType)));
00604 
00605 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00606     cout << "parameter of mecab_dict_index() to compile system dictionary: ";
00607     for(size_t i=0; i<compileParam.size(); ++i)
00608     {
00609         cout << compileParam[i] << " ";
00610     }
00611     cout << endl;
00612 #endif
00613 
00614     // compile system dictionary files into binary type
00615     cout << "compiling into binary format" << endl;
00616     int compileResult = mecab_dict_index(compileParam.size(), &compileParam[0]);
00617     if(compileResult != 0)
00618     {
00619         cerr << "fail to compile system ditionary" << endl;
00620         return 0;
00621     }
00622 
00623     string src, dest;
00624     // if compound.def exists, copy it to the destination directory
00625     src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, POS_COMBINE_DEF_FILE);
00626     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, POS_COMBINE_DEF_FILE);
00627     if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00628     {
00629         cout << POS_COMBINE_DEF_FILE << " is not found in " << txtDirPath << ", no rule is defined to combine tokens with specific POS." << endl;
00630     }
00631 
00632     // source files to compile into archive
00633     vector<string> srcFiles;
00634 
00635     // dicrc
00636     src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, DICT_CONFIG_FILE);
00637     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, DICT_CONFIG_FILE);
00638     // fill "binary-charset" in dicrc
00639     if(! fillBinaryEncodeType(src.c_str(), dest.c_str(), binEncodeType))
00640     {
00641         cerr << "fail to fill binary-charset from " << src << " to " << dest << endl;
00642     }
00643     srcFiles.push_back(dest);
00644 
00645     // definition files
00646     size_t configNum = sizeof(DICT_DEF_FILES) / sizeof(DICT_DEF_FILES[0]);
00647     for(size_t i=0; i<configNum; ++i)
00648     {
00649         srcFiles.push_back(createFilePath(txtDirPath, DICT_DEF_FILES[i]));
00650     }
00651 
00652     // pos-id.def
00653     srcFiles.push_back(createFilePath(txtDirPath, POS_ID_DEF_FILE));
00654 
00655     // map-kana.def
00656     srcFiles.push_back(createFilePath(txtDirPath, KANA_MAP_DEF_FILE));
00657 
00658     // map-width.def
00659     srcFiles.push_back(createFilePath(txtDirPath, WIDTH_MAP_DEF_FILE));
00660 
00661     // map-case.def
00662     srcFiles.push_back(createFilePath(txtDirPath, CASE_MAP_DEF_FILE));
00663 
00664     // sent-sep.def
00665     srcFiles.push_back(createFilePath(txtDirPath, SENTENCE_SEPARATOR_DEF_FILE));
00666 
00667     // get binary file names
00668     configNum = sizeof(DICT_BINARY_FILES) / sizeof(DICT_BINARY_FILES[0]);
00669     for(size_t i=0; i<configNum; ++i)
00670     {
00671         srcFiles.push_back(createFilePath(binDirPath, DICT_BINARY_FILES[i]));
00672     }
00673 
00674     // compile into archive file
00675     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, DICT_ARCHIVE_FILE);
00676     cout << "compressing into archive file " << dest << endl;
00677     if(JMA_Dictionary::compile(srcFiles, dest.c_str()) == false)
00678         return 0;
00679 
00680     // remove dicrc under binary path
00681     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, DICT_CONFIG_FILE);
00682     if(! removeFile(dest))
00683         cerr << "fail to delete temporary configuration file: " << dest << endl;
00684 
00685     // remove temporary binary files
00686     configNum = sizeof(DICT_BINARY_FILES) / sizeof(DICT_BINARY_FILES[0]);
00687     for(size_t i=0; i<configNum; ++i)
00688     {
00689         dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, DICT_BINARY_FILES[i]);
00690         if(! removeFile(dest))
00691             cerr << "fail to delete temporary binary file: " << dest << endl;
00692     }
00693 
00694     return 1;
00695 }
00696 
00697 bool JMA_Knowledge::isStopWord(const std::string& word) const
00698 {
00699     return stopWords_.find(word) != stopWords_.end();
00700 }
00701 
00702 bool JMA_Knowledge::isSentenceSeparator(const char* p) const
00703 {
00704     return sentSeps_.find(p) != sentSeps_.end();
00705 }
00706 
00707 bool JMA_Knowledge::isKeywordPOS(int pos) const
00708 {
00709     if(keywordPOSSet_.empty())
00710         return true;
00711 
00712     return keywordPOSSet_.find(pos) != keywordPOSSet_.end();
00713 }

00739 
00740 bool JMA_Knowledge::loadSentenceSeparatorConfig(const char* fileName, MeCab::Iconv& iconv)
00741 {
00742     const DictUnit* dict = dictionary_->getDict(fileName);
00743     if(! dict)
00744     {
00745         cerr << "fail to load sentence separator file " << fileName << endl;
00746         return false;
00747     }
00748     istrstream ist(dict->text_, dict->length_);
00749     if(! ist)
00750     {
00751         cerr << "fail to open string stream of sentence separator file " << fileName << endl;
00752         return false;
00753     }
00754 
00755     // remove existing separators
00756     sentSeps_.clear();
00757 
00758     string line;
00759     while(getline(ist, line))
00760     {
00761         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00762         if(line.empty() || line[0] == '#')
00763             continue;
00764 
00765         if(! iconv.convert(&line))
00766         {
00767             cerr << "error to convert encoding for line: " << line << endl;
00768             continue;
00769         }
00770         sentSeps_.insert(line);
00771     }
00772 
00773 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00774     cout << "Sentence separators loaded from " << fileName << ": ";
00775     for(set<string>::const_iterator it=sentSeps_.begin(); it!=sentSeps_.end(); ++it)
00776         cout << *it;
00777     cout << endl;
00778 #endif
00779 
00780     return true;
00781 }
00782 
00783 unsigned int JMA_Knowledge::convertTxtToCSV(const UserDictFileType& userDicFile, std::ostream& ost)
00784 {
00785     unsigned int count = 0;
00786 
00787     const int userNounIndex = getUserNounPOSIndex();
00788     if(userNounIndex == -1)
00789     {
00790         cerr << "fail to get POS index of user noun." << endl;
00791         return count;
00792     }
00793 
00794     const char* userNounPOS = posTable_.getPOS(userNounIndex, POSTable::POS_FORMAT_FULL_CATEGORY);
00795     if(! userNounPOS)
00796     {
00797         cerr << "fail to get POS string of user noun." << endl;
00798         return count;
00799     }
00800 
00801     vector<string> t;
00802     const int posSize = tokenizeCSV(userNounPOS, t);
00803     assert(posSize > 0 && "the user noun POS size must be positive");
00804 
00805     // tokenize word into each characters
00806     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer(getCType());
00807 
00808     const char* srcEnc = Knowledge::encodeStr(userDicFile.second);
00809     const char* destEnc = Knowledge::encodeStr(getEncodeType());
00810     MeCab::Iconv iconv;
00811     if(! iconv.open(srcEnc, destEnc))
00812     {
00813         cerr << "error to open encoding conversion from " << srcEnc << " to " << destEnc << endl;
00814         return false;
00815     }
00816 
00817     const char* fileName = userDicFile.first.c_str();
00818     ifstream in(fileName);
00819     if( !in )
00820     {
00821         cerr << "fail to open user dictionary " << fileName << ", ignoring this file." << endl;
00822         return count;
00823     }
00824 
00825 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00826     cout << "Converting user dictionary " << fileName << " (" << srcEnc << " => " << destEnc << ") ..." << endl;
00827 #endif
00828 
00829     string line, word, pattern;
00830     istringstream iss;
00831     ostringstream ostrs;
00832     while(getline(in, line))
00833     {
00834         // remove carriage return character
00835         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00836 
00837         if (line.empty() || line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#')
00838             continue;
00839 
00840         if(! iconv.convert(&line))
00841         {
00842             cerr << "error to convert encoding from " << srcEnc << " to " << destEnc << " for line: " << line << endl;
00843             continue;
00844         }
00845 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00846         cout << "line: " << line << endl;
00847 #endif
00848 
00849         iss.clear();
00850         iss.str(line);
00851         ostrs.str(""); // reset output string stream to empty
00852 
00853         if(iss >> word)
00854             ostrs << word << ",-1,-1," << USER_NOUN_COST;
00855         else
00856         {
00857             cerr << "no word is defined in line: " << line << endl;
00858             continue;
00859         }
00860 
00861         ostrs << "," << userNounPOS;
00862         for(int i=posSize; i<readFormOffset_; ++i)
00863         {
00864             ostrs << ",*";
00865         }
00866 
00867         bool hasRead = false;
00868         vector<string> compVec;
00869         if(iss >> pattern)
00870         {
00871             if(tokenizeCSV(pattern, compVec) == 0)
00872             {
00873                 cerr << "fail to tokenize from pattern: " << pattern << endl;
00874                 continue;
00875             }
00876 
00877             if(isNumber(compVec[0].c_str()))
00878             {
00879                 MorphemeList decompList;
00880                 bool isAllNumber = true;
00881                 bool isValidCharCount = true;
00882                 tokenizer.assign(word.c_str());
00883                 for(unsigned int i=0; i<compVec.size(); ++i)
00884                 {
00885                     if(! isNumber(compVec[i].c_str()))
00886                     {
00887                         isAllNumber = false;
00888                         break;
00889                     }
00890 
00891                     Morpheme morp;
00892                     int charCount = convertFromStr<int>(compVec[i]);
00893                     for(int j=0; j<charCount; ++j)
00894                     {
00895                         if(const char* p = tokenizer.next())
00896                             morp.lexicon_ += p;
00897                         else
00898                         {
00899                             isValidCharCount = false;
00900                             break;
00901                         }
00902                     }
00903 
00904                     if(! isValidCharCount)
00905                         break;
00906 
00907                     decompList.push_back(morp);
00908                 }
00909 
00910                 if(! isAllNumber)
00911                 {
00912                     cerr << "invalid format, only digit is allowed in decomposition pattern: " << pattern << endl;
00913                     continue;
00914                 }
00915 
00916                 // should reach the word end
00917                 if(! isValidCharCount || tokenizer.next())
00918                 {
00919                     cerr << "unmatched character numbers in line: " << line << endl;
00920                     continue;
00921                 }
00922 
00923                 if(iss >> pattern)
00924                 {
00925                     if(tokenizeCSV(pattern, compVec) == 0)
00926                     {
00927                         cerr << "fail to tokenize from pattern: " << pattern << endl;
00928                         continue;
00929                     }
00930 
00931                     if(compVec.size() != decompList.size())
00932                     {
00933                         cerr << "invalid format, the pronunciation pattern size is not equal to decomposition pattern size in line: " << line << endl;
00934                         continue;
00935                     }
00936 
00937                     for(unsigned int i=0; i<compVec.size(); ++i)
00938                     {
00939                         decompList[i].readForm_ = compVec[i];
00940                     }
00941 
00942                     hasRead = true;
00943                 }
00944 
00945                 decompMap_[word] = decompList;
00946 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00947                 cout << "word " << word << " is decomposed into: ";
00948                 for(unsigned int i=0; i<decompList.size(); ++i)
00949                 {
00950                     cout << decompList[i].lexicon_;
00951                     if(! decompList[i].readForm_.empty())
00952                         cout << "/" << decompList[i].readForm_;
00953                     cout << ", ";
00954                 }
00955                 cout << endl;
00956 #endif
00957             }
00958             else
00959                 hasRead = true;
00960         }
00961 
00962         if(hasRead)
00963         {
00964             assert(compVec.size() && "the read form should not be empty.");
00965 
00966             // combine compVec into whole read form
00967             string wholeRead;
00968             for(unsigned int i=0; i<compVec.size(); ++i)
00969             {
00970                 wholeRead += compVec[i];
00971             }
00972             ostrs << "," << wholeRead;
00973         }
00974         else
00975             ostrs << ",*";
00976 
00977         ost << ostrs.str() << endl;
00978         ++count;
00979     }
00980 
00981     return count;
00982 }
00983 
00984 bool JMA_Knowledge::fillBinaryEncodeType(const char* src, const char* dest, EncodeType binEncodeType) const
00985 {
00986     ifstream ist(src);
00987     if(! ist)
00988     {
00989         cerr << "cannot read configuration file: " << src << endl;
00990         return false;
00991     }
00992 
00993     ofstream ost(dest);
00994     if(! ost)
00995     {
00996         cerr << "cannot write configuration file: " << dest << endl;
00997         return false;
00998     }
00999 
01000     string line, left, middle;
01001     istringstream iss;
01002     bool fill = false;
01003     while(getline(ist, line))
01004     {
01005         // remove carriage return character
01006         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
01007 
01008         if(line.empty() || line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#')
01009             ost << line << endl;
01010         else
01011         {
01012             iss.clear();
01013             iss.str(line);
01014             if(iss >> left >> middle && left == "binary-charset" && middle == "=")
01015             {
01016                 ost << left << " " << middle << " " << Knowledge::encodeStr(binEncodeType) << endl;
01017                 fill = true;
01018 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
01019                 cout << "JMA_Knowledge::fillBinaryEncodeType(), src: " << src << ", dest: " << dest << endl;
01020                 cout << left << " " << middle << " " << Knowledge::encodeStr(binEncodeType) << endl;
01021                 cout << endl;
01022 #endif
01023             }
01024             else
01025                 ost << line << endl;
01026         }
01027     }
01028 
01029     if(fill)
01030         return true;
01031     else
01032     {
01033         cerr << "the field binary-charset is not found in configuration file: " << src << endl;
01034         return false;
01035     }
01036 }
01037 
01038 int JMA_Knowledge::setKeywordPOS(const std::vector<std::string>& posVec)
01039 {
01040     keywordPOSSet_.clear();
01041 
01042     int posIndex;
01043     for(vector<string>::const_iterator it=posVec.begin(); it!=posVec.end(); ++it)
01044     {
01045         posIndex = posTable_.getIndexFromAlphaPOS(*it);
01046         if(posIndex != -1)
01047             keywordPOSSet_.insert(posIndex);
01048     }
01049 
01050     return keywordPOSSet_.size();
01051 }
